text:
...Producer
You're in a good mood today, aren't you?
You've got a huge grin on your face, after all...

Ah...! Haha, it was showing on my face, was it... After this, 
I'm going to have drinks with someone I who helped me out a lot.

Someone that's helped you out a lot, in other words,
someone who knows your weaknesses, right Producer?

Fufuu
Well, please go get teased a lot.

Then if, at somepoint, we have a reunion in a few years,
I'll be sure to tease you plenty as well.
...Something like that, I don't think should be allowed.

Only a few years from now
... would you really have to

Ah, no.
Sorry... I really was just joking around.

──Well then, I'll be off. I'll be sure to do plenty
of bragging about 283Pro and Mamimi!

Don't raise the hurdle too much for me, please.
I'm a bad girl after all──
Bad enough that I still can't stand on my own...
